title: Mahasiswa Berprestasi 2025
description: Selected as one of the 4 Outstanding Students of 2025 as a first semester student

title: Honorable Mention (45th) ICPC Asia Jakarta
description: Placed 45th in the prestigious ICPC Asia Jakarta Regional Contest, solving 2 complex algorithmic challenges against top university teams across Asia-Pacific

title: Honorable Mention (55th) ICPC Indonesia National Contest
description: Secured 55th position at the ICPC Indonesia National Contest, successfully solving 5 advanced programming problems in a highly competitive field

title: Silver Medal - KMIPN Hackathon Challenge
description: Won 2nd Place at the National Polytechnic Informatics Student Competition (KMIPN) Hackathon Challenge, leading the top-ranking first-year team

title: Bronze Medal - Srifoton Competitive Programming
description: Secured 3rd Place at Srifoton CP, one of Indonesia's most prestigious university-level competitive programming festivals

title: Finalist - Veternity Competitive Programming
description: Qualified as a finalist in the Veternity Competitive Programming contest, competing against Indonesia's top programming talents

title: Finalist - IFest Competitive Programming
description: Achieved finalist status at IFest CP hosted by Padjajaran University, one of Indonesia's leading institutions

title: Finalist - PingFest Competitive Programming
description: Reached the finals of PingFest CP organized by Sebelas Maret University, showcasing consistent competitive programming excellence
